troparion: (Tone 1) O Lord, since we are strangers on earth, * as were all our fathers before us, * keep us without fault in the shortness of our life. * O Savior, who loves mankind, * have mercy on us.
prokimenon: Be attentive to the sound of my plea,
O my King and my God.
Give ear to my words, O Lord,* understand my cry.
second_prokimenon: O Lord, in Your anger, rebuke me not,
chasten me not in Your wrath.
Have pity on me, O Lord, for I am weak; heal me. O Lord, for my very bones are troubled.
